tool_description: This API predicts if a given text ticket is urgent or not, for customer support domain.
name: Urgency Ticket
title: Urgency Ticket

api_list.name: Detect Ticket Urgency
api_list.description: Detects if a ticket is something urgent or not.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://urgency-ticket.p.rapidapi.com/urgency"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "urgency-ticket.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://urgency-ticket.p.rapidapi.com/urgency"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "urgency-ticket.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
